text: Lecomtedoxa nogo is a species of plant in the family Sapotaceae. It is endemic to Gabon. The species is listed as vulnerable.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Lecomtedoxa nogo. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
